mapper.select: select id, title, description, html, css, javascript, writerid, created_at, (select count(*) from likecode where codeid=code.id) likes, (select user.username from user where code.writerid = user.id) writername from code order by id desc

select code.id, title, description, html, css, javascript, writerid, created_at, (select count(*) from likecode where codeid=code.id) likes, (select user.username from user where code.writerid = user.id) writername from code where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into code(title, description, html, css, javascript, writerid, created_at) values(#{title}, #{description}, #{html}, #{css}, #{javascript}, #{writerid}, now())
mapper.update: update code set title=#{title}, description=#{description}, html=#{html}, css=#{css}, html=#{html}, javascript=#{javascript}, writerid=#{writerid} where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from likecode where userid=#{userid} and codeid=#{codeid}
